MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH45 postcode area of Peebles. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:25am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a faulty transformer near to the Dawyck Mill substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:24pm
